message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think it's worth more than that to me.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm motivated to sell, I can't accept $10,500. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $10,750, but no higher. Can you meet me there?
